did.unittitle:
University of Michigan Club of Detroit records
1913-1957
did.abstract: Records, 1913-1957, of the University of Michigan Club of Detroit, an alumni group. Includes correspondence files and undated papers concerning the history of the club.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were received from donors nos. 1278 and 4107.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, University of Michigan Club of Detroit Records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The University of Michigan Club of Detroit is an alumni group founded with 170 members on October 31, 1895 as the "University of Michigan Association of Detroit." Since reorganization in 1911, the leadership of the Club has included men of diverse occupations and varying financial standing. More recently, the organization was renamed the University of Michigan Club of Greater Detroit.
Source: "The University of Michigan Club of Greater Detroit . . . Through the Years", by John T Campbell '48, '59 MBA; published online at http://www.umclubgreaterdetroit.org/history/history.asp

scopecontent.p: The records include correspondence files (1913, 1926-1957) and some undated papers concerning the history of the club.

did.unittitle: Concerning the history of the University of Michigan Alumni Club, undated.
